Specify output options for a static report containing heatmaps

Source: R/prepare.R
outputspec_static_heatmap.Rd

Specify output options for a static report containing heatmaps

Usage

outputspec_static_heatmap(
  fill_colour = "blue",
  y_label = NULL,
  item_order = NULL
)

Arguments

fill_colour

colour to use for the tiles

y_label

string for y-axis label. Optional

item_order

vector of values contained in item_col, for explicitly ordering the items in the table. Any values not mentioned are included alphabetically at the end. If TRUE, items will be sorted in ascending order. If NULL, the original order as given by unique(item_col) will be used.

Value

An outputspec() object

On this page

Developed by T. Phuong Quan, University of Oxford.
